pullrequest.title: Add controller examples for physics stress testing

content.raw: Yeah, as whimsical as this argument parsing style is, I'm also in favor of more traditional inputs. A frequency multiplier and amplitude multiplier would be good, and maybe if there's one argument, make it both the frequency and amplitude multiplier.
content.html: Yeah, as whimsical as this argument parsing style is, I'm also in favor of more traditional inputs. A frequency multiplier and amplitude multiplier would be good, and maybe if there's one argument, make it both the frequency and amplitude multiplier.
